text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump I find mask-less Donald Trump watching fireworks like a Juvenile, disgusting. Over 50,000 Americans are becoming INFECTED with Coronavirus daily as he watches fireworks. The American people are demanding that the White House staff wear masks! Quit being an infection risk! https://t.co/LUJCLwigKO
